mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Pet_Tbl ( OWNER_ID, PET_ID, PET_NAME, AGE, SIGNIFICANT ) VALUES ( #{owner_Id}, #{pet_Id}, #{pet_name}, #{age}, #{significant} )
mapper.select: SELECT OWNER_ID, PET_ID, PET_NAME, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, AGE, CURDATE()) AS AGE, SIGNIFICANT FROM Pet_Tbl WHERE OWNER_Id = #{owner_Id}
SELECT OWNER_ID, PET_ID, PET_NAME, AGE, SIGNIFICANT FROM Pet_Tbl WHERE PET_ID = #{pet_Id}
